summary:
This text is a decree declaring a national mourning period in Argentina following the death of Pope Francis. Here's a breakdown of the key information presented in a table format for easier readability:

| Category             | Information                                                                                                                                                                  |
|----------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **Date of Decree**   | April 22, 2025                                                                                                                                                                |
| **Decree Number**    | 25165/25                                                                                                                                                                      |
| **Reason for Decree** | Death of Pope Francis on April 21, 2025                                                                                                                                           |
| **Pope Francis' Birth** | December 17, 1936, Flores neighborhood, Buenos Aires, Argentina (born Jorge Mario Bergoglio)                                                                                       |
| **Duration of Mourning** | Seven (7) days                                                                                                                                                               |
| **Mourning Actions**   | National mourning throughout Argentina; National flag at half-mast on all public buildings; Ministry of Foreign Affairs, International Trade and Worship to take relevant measures |
| **President**         | Milei (Gerardo Wertheine is likely the Chief of Cabinet)                                                                                                                           |
| **Legal Basis**       | Article 99, section 1, of the Argentine National Constitution                                                                                                                    |


The decree details Pope Francis' life, emphasizing his Argentine origins, his Jesuit order membership, his academic achievements, his rise within the Catholic Church, and his papacy. It highlights his commitment to social justice and his impact on the world.  The decree concludes with the declaration of national mourning and the actions to be taken.
